entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:24 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 06:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
Temperature: -34.4°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -38.1°C
Wind: NW 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 38 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 38 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
